top_comments.comment: They have so much sun! Why not talk about putting up solar panels in all that desert and on the buildings? We did it in Las Vegas. It's affordable, clean energy.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Life of a privileged content creator 😊. BBC didn't see anyone more eligible to talk abt the increasing temperature in Kuwait
Let's plant trees if there is a place we can plant (own land or roadside).  If you live in a narrow and crowded place, at least plant flowers/trees in pots.  I also did it at my terrace...
They have so much sun! Why not talk about putting up solar panels in all that desert and on the buildings? We did it in Las Vegas. It's affordable, clean energy.
what the hell is this. show us the PEOPLE.

Planting trees is smart move....
And everyone need have electricity car .

No diesel or fuel car.
Hahaha western girl goes to the dessert and is shocked it's hot!! WTF Did she go there thinking it's going to be the same as America??? Is this a joke?
More trees may attract more birds, which in turn may attract more or other animals.
Om Naief is the hero of this piece.  I guess Kuwait is a poor country that can't help the lady plant more trees.
Hahahaha all the money in the world cannot buy common sense 🤣🤣🤣🤣

One Kuwaiti driving one car and small families living in big houses just for an rubbish"ego"of being a Kuwaiti.
Need to change your life styles and a loyal Kuwaiti for your country (like that lady who is planting trees.) and not for money.
Plant trees as meteorologist said and there is lot of area in the northern part of the country.
Secondly use solar energy to produce electricity.
Use water coolers instead of a/c in dry heat. Use a.c only in humid weather.
Use public transport or atleast travel 3-4 ppl in a car to reduce traffic jams
And where’s the common Joe bloggs?? Typical BBC
I agree with om naief, Kuwait needs more trees. 🌴 🌴 🌴 🌴
